channel.title: Player count for server?
channel.description:
hey guys, i have recently noticed a lot of rsps sites with player counters on them.
e.g:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/playercount.gif[/img]
or
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/peepsonline.gif[/img]
I was wondering, how do i make one like that? some1 plz tell meh!

item.title: Player count for server?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

You can have something save the player count to a MySQL data base every X minutes and the page loads it, or if you run a web server and the game server on the same box you can easily hard code writing to a file or requesting information using some sort of agent or something. These aren’t the best way to do it, but it’s the simplest.

Read full topic
